subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Probably a dialectal form of {{och-l|女|id=1|woman; female}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

Alternatively, {{zh-ref|Li (1990)}} proposed that this may be a {{bor|zh|tai|-}} substrate loan, related to {{cog|za|nax||younger maternal uncle or aunt}}, {{cog|th|น้า}} (which go back to {{cog|tai-pro|*naːᶜ||mother's younger sibling}}).

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|豬乸|雞乸|馬乸|狗乸|貓乸|鴨乸|乸型|婆乸|蜞乸|仔乸|蝨乸|蛤乸|後底乸|老虎乸|有爺生，冇乸教}}
